2024.title: Swift 6 and SwiftUI 3.0 released
2024.description: 2024 brought performance boosts and ergonomics improvements in Swift 6 and SwiftUI 3.0, optimizing animation and multi-platform compatibility.

2024.title: AI-integrated apps rise
2024.description: Developers used Core ML and Create ML to personalize app experiences using voice, vision, and natural language models.

2024.title: HomeKit expands IoT ecosystem
2024.description: iOS developers adopted HomeKit APIs to integrate smart appliances and automation workflows using Matter protocol.
